about_the_game:
The Ninja returns!

Dive into a new ninja adventure with new skills, new enemies and lots of kickass ninja action! Chibi Ninja Shino-kun is back, and he's ready to ninja it up. Jump, run and hookshot your way through a forest, a crystal cave and more in this 16bit-inspired platformer. Along the way you'll run up walls, climb along ceilings and throw shurikens at  demons inspired by Japanese folklore!

Are you ninja enough to take on the challenge and get back your treasure?  

Features

  • All the ninja classics are here: Wall-jumps, dive kicks, ceiling-running... Nothing can stand in your way!

  • New Skills: Run up walls and use the diagonal hookshot to launch yourself across the levels!

  • Pick up and hurl shurikens at enemies to snipe them from afar!

  • Enemies inspired by Japanese folklore, such as Oni, Hone-Onna and lantern demons!

  • Compete with others for the best times on the Steam Leaderboards!

What are you waiting for? Jump back into your ninja pants and show the world what you got!

name: Chibi Ninja Shino-kun 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL Support required
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

short_description: The Chibi Ninja is back! Use your ninja skills to run up walls and along ceilings, launch yourself around with your hookshot, and kick demon butts inspired by Japanese folklore!
